We perform testing of daily images ''before'' each milestone is released, in preparation for wider distribution. For information on testing the milestones themselves see <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/testing|ubuntu.com/testing]]</nowiki>.

Please refer to the <nowiki>[[Procedures|Testing procedures]]</nowiki> for details, or if your new, go through the <nowiki>[[Testing-ISO-Walkthrough|ISO Test Walkthrough]]</nowiki>.  The alpha, beta and final milestones are tested according to a specific <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/QuantalQuetzal/ReleaseSchedule|Release Schedule]]</nowiki>.  Test reports are filed in the test tracker at '''<nowiki>[[http://iso.qa.ubuntu.com/|iso.qa.ubuntu.com]]</nowiki>''' and bugs are filed in Launchpad.

If you want to help with the development of the <nowiki>[[http://iso.qa.ubuntu.com|ISO tracker]]</nowiki> you can visit the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu-qa-website/|launchpad page]]</nowiki>.
